long_description: For increased protection and expanded coverage, Oakley Half Jacket 2.0 XL sunglasses combine cool style and clarity. Open-edge design extends your vertical field of vision and peripheral clarity. Lightweight nylon frames are flexible and stress resistant. Shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses enhance durability. Unique Oakley 3-point fit includes optical alignment for sharp, accurate vision, impact absorption for improved protection, and geometry designed to enhance peripheral view. Molded ear- and nose-pieces increase adhesion as you sweat, maintaining a secure fit when competition heats up. Comes with a specially woven, electro-static Microclear bag for cleaning and storage to preserve the superior optical quality. Polished black frames come with black Iridium(R) gray-tinted lenses that provide neutral contrast-best for extremely bright light. Reflective Iridium coating enhances optical clarity and contrast and reduces glare in varying light. Black/dark gray frames come with G40 photochromic brown tinted lenses; photochromic lenses automatically darken in response to sunlight. XL = Extra lens coverage.
